content.p: The Records Management Framework has been established to: The framework consists of a network of Records Officers in schools and departments who are responsible for informing staff in their areas about key polices, and promoting good records management practice. It is intended to be 2-way flow for information about records management issues. Records Officers Find out who your local Records Officer is. Schools and Professional Services Departments Records Officers.
